actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to provide that procurement programs under such Act shall remain in full force and effect without regard to the enactment of any implementing bill under the Trade Act of 1974, nor any provision of law heretofore or hereinafter enacted.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to declare that the programs assisting small business concerns in obtaining government contracts shall remain in effect notwithstanding any other provision of law, including implementing legislation under the Trade Act of 1974.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to provide that procurement programs under such Act shall remain in full force and effect without regard to the enactment of any implementing bill under the Trade Act of 1974, nor any provision of law heretofore or hereinafter enacted.
